dcterms:creator: Kentaro Kurihara
Daisuke Kawahara
Tomohide Shibata
dcterms:description: JCQA is a Japanese question-answering dataset in a five-choice format that assesses common sense knowledge. It is the Japanese version of CommonsenseQA, created to evaluate common sense reasoning ability, consisting of pairs of question sentences and answer choices.
dcterms:title: JCQA

dcterms:creator: Ai Ishii
Naoya Inoue
Satoshi Sekine
dcterms:description: JEMHQA is a Japanese open-ended question answering dataset designed as a multi-hop QA task, evaluating a model's ability to generate answers directly from given questions, with questions created using information from the Japanese version of Wikipedia.
dcterms:title: JEMHQA

dcterms:creator: Satoshi Sekine
dcterms:description: NIILC is a dataset created for developing question-answering systems in Japanese, featuring straightforward questions that can be answered by referencing an encyclopedia, valuable for evaluating encyclopedic knowledge.
dcterms:title: NIILC

dcterms:creator: Pranav Rajpurkar
Jian Zhang
Konstantin Lopyrev
Percy Liang
dcterms:description: JSQuAD is a Japanese machine reading comprehension dataset, focusing on question-answering style, which involves reading a document and a question, and then extracting a segment of text in the document as the answer.
dcterms:title: JSQuAD

dcterms:creator: Tahmid Hasan
Abhik Bhattacharjee
Md. Saiful Islam
Kazi Mubasshir
Yuan-Fang Li
Rifat Shahriyar
dcterms:description: XL-Sum Japanese version is a dataset created by extracting the Japanese portion from XL-Sum, a large-scale summarization dataset collected from BBC News articles, filtered for abstractive summarization.
dcterms:title: XL-Sum

dcterms:creator: Freda Shi
Mirac Suzgun
Markus Freitag
Xuezhi Wang
Suraj Srivats
Soroush Vosoughi
Hyung Won Chung
Yi Tay
Sebastian Ruder
Denny Zhou
Dipanjan Das
Jason Wei
dcterms:description: MGSM is a dataset created by selecting elementary school arithmetic word problems from GSM8K and manually translating them into Japanese, requiring both linguistic knowledge and mathematical reasoning ability.
dcterms:title: MGSM

dcterms:creator: Loïc Barrault

dcterms:description: WMT’20 is a dataset for machine translation tasks, providing parallel corpora for English-Japanese and Japanese-English translation.
dcterms:title: WMT’20 En-Ja
